definition: to tell someone a secret, especially without intending to

examples.text: That Jefferson is one cool cat.
Mr Cruitt says ad spending will triple this year, when the company will begin promoting the cat version of the drug.
No one was about except a black and white cat asleep in the sun.

definition: to tell someone a secret, especially without intending to
sense.lexical_unit: let the cat out of the bag

definition: play (a game of) cat and mouse (with somebody) [to pretend to allow someone to do or have what they want, and then to stop them from doing or having it]

examples.text: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.

definition: to pretend to allow someone to do or have what they want, and then to stop them from doing or having it

examples.text: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.

sense.lexical_unit: play (a game of) cat and mouse (with somebody)
